start.text: Hey there, looking to buy or sell some fish? Or maybe you're interested in a little challenge?

options.text: I'd like to sell some fish.

sell_fish.text: Alright, let's see what you've got. I'll take any fish you have off your hands for a fair price.

quest_intro.text: I'm looking for a skilled angler to help me complete a collection. I need one of each type of fish, from the common carp to the legendary ancient bass. If you can bring them all to me, I'll make it worth your while.

quest_accept.text: Excellent! I knew you were the right person for the job. Come back to me when you've caught them all.

quest_incomplete.text: You're making good progress, but you still have more fish to catch. Keep at it!

quest_complete.text: Amazing! You've done it! You've caught every type of fish. As promised, here is your reward.

end.text: Good luck out there, and may your lines be tight!
